languages.text: "Да что там!" {n}— горечь прорезается в голосе Ардженты.{/n} "Я считала себя особенной, избранной, превосходящей всех моих сестер еще в послушничестве. Гордыня, слепая гордыня. На деле же каждый мой шаг на пути сюда сопровождался ошибками".

traits.locale_text: "Да что там!" {n}— горечь прорезается в голосе Ардженты.{/n} "Я считала себя особенной, избранной, превосходящей всех моих сестер еще в послушничестве. Гордыня, слепая гордыня. На деле же каждый мой шаг на пути сюда сопровождался ошибками".

languages.text: "But never mind that!" {n}Bitterness creeps into Argenta's voice.{/n} "I thought myself special, chosen, worthier than all my sisters even back when I was a novice. Pride. I was blinded by pride. In reality, every step of my way here was fraught with errors."
languages.original_text: "Да что там!" {n}— горечь прорезается в голосе Ардженты.{/n} "Я считала себя особенной, избранной, превосходящей всех моих сестер еще в послушничестве. Гордыня, слепая гордыня. На деле же каждый мой шаг на пути сюда сопровождался ошибками".

traits.locale_text: "But never mind that!" {n}Bitterness creeps into Argenta's voice.{/n} "I thought myself special, chosen, worthier than all my sisters even back when I was a novice. Pride. I was blinded by pride. In reality, every step of my way here was fraught with errors."

"But never mind that!" {n}Bitterness creeps into Argenta's voice.{/n} "I thought myself special, chosen, worthier than all my sisters even back when I was a novice. Pride. I was blinded by pride. In reality, every step of my way here was fraught with errors."

"But never mind that!" {n}Bitterness creeps into Argenta's voice.{/n} "I thought myself special, chosen, worthier than all my sisters even back when I was a novice. Pride. I was blinded by pride. In reality, every step of my way here was fraught with errors."

"But never mind that!" {n}Bitterness creeps into Argenta's voice.{/n} "I thought myself special, chosen, worthier than all my sisters even back when I was a novice. Pride. I was blinded by pride. In reality, every step of my way here was fraught with errors."

"But never mind that!" {n}Bitterness creeps into Argenta's voice.{/n} "I thought myself special, chosen, worthier than all my sisters even back when I was a novice. Pride. I was blinded by pride. In reality, every step of my way here was fraught with errors."

languages.text: 「けれど気にしないでほしい！」{n}アルジェンタの声は苦々しい。{/n}「私は自分が特別な選ばれし者で、他のどのシスターよりも価値があると、見習いの時でさえそう思っていた。プライドだ。私はプライドで目が眩んでいた。実際のところ、ここまでの道のりの全てのステップは過ちだらけだ」
languages.original_text: "But never mind that!" {n}Bitterness creeps into Argenta's voice.{/n} "I thought myself special, chosen, worthier than all my sisters even back when I was a novice. Pride. I was blinded by pride. In reality, every step of my way here was fraught with errors."

traits.locale_text: 「けれど気にしないでほしい！」{n}アルジェンタの声は苦々しい。{/n}「私は自分が特別な選ばれし者で、他のどのシスターよりも価値があると、見習いの時でさえそう思っていた。プライドだ。私はプライドで目が眩んでいた。実際のところ、ここまでの道のりの全てのステップは過ちだらけだ」

languages.text: “但这一切并不重要！”{n}阿洁塔的声音带着苦涩。{/n}“当我还是个学徒的时候，我就认为自己是特别的，认为自己是帝皇亲自选中的，比所有其他的修女都更有价值。我的傲慢蒙蔽了我的双眼。事实上，我走到这里的每一步，都充满了错误。”
languages.original_text: "But never mind that!" {n}Bitterness creeps into Argenta's voice.{/n} "I thought myself special, chosen, worthier than all my sisters even back when I was a novice. Pride. I was blinded by pride. In reality, every step of my way here was fraught with errors."

traits.locale_text: “但这一切并不重要！”{n}阿洁塔的声音带着苦涩。{/n}“当我还是个学徒的时候，我就认为自己是特别的，认为自己是帝皇亲自选中的，比所有其他的修女都更有价值。我的傲慢蒙蔽了我的双眼。事实上，我走到这里的每一步，都充满了错误。”

languages.text: « Enfin, peu importe ! » {n}L'amertume transparaît dans la voix d'Argenta.{/n} « Du temps de mon noviciat, je me suis prise pour un être à part, une élue supérieure à l'ensemble de mes sœurs. J'étais aveuglée par l'orgueil. En réalité, chacune des étapes qui m'ont menée jusqu'ici était une regrettable erreur. »
languages.original_text: "But never mind that!" {n}Bitterness creeps into Argenta's voice.{/n} "I thought myself special, chosen, worthier than all my sisters even back when I was a novice. Pride. I was blinded by pride. In reality, every step of my way here was fraught with errors."

traits.locale_text: « Enfin, peu importe ! » {n}L'amertume transparaît dans la voix d'Argenta.{/n} « Du temps de mon noviciat, je me suis prise pour un être à part, une élue supérieure à l'ensemble de mes sœurs. J'étais aveuglée par l'orgueil. En réalité, chacune des étapes qui m'ont menée jusqu'ici était une regrettable erreur. »

languages.text: «¡Pero eso no importa!». {n}La amargura invade la voz de Argenta.{/n} «Creía ser especial. La elegida, más digna que mis hermanas incluso cuando solo era una novicia. El orgullo. El orgullo es lo que me cegaba. En realidad, cada paso que me ha llevado hasta aquí ha estado plagado de errores».
languages.original_text: "But never mind that!" {n}Bitterness creeps into Argenta's voice.{/n} "I thought myself special, chosen, worthier than all my sisters even back when I was a novice. Pride. I was blinded by pride. In reality, every step of my way here was fraught with errors."

traits.locale_text: «¡Pero eso no importa!». {n}La amargura invade la voz de Argenta.{/n} «Creía ser especial. La elegida, más digna que mis hermanas incluso cuando solo era una novicia. El orgullo. El orgullo es lo que me cegaba. En realidad, cada paso que me ha llevado hasta aquí ha estado plagado de errores».

languages.text: "Aber vergesst das!" {n}Verbitterung schleicht sich in Argentas Stimme.{/n} "Ich hielt mich für etwas Besonderes, auserkoren, würdiger als alle meine Schwestern, schon als ich noch Novizin war. Hochmut. Ich war von Hochmut geblendet. In Wahrheit war jeder Schritt meines Wegs hierher mit Fehlern gepflastert."
languages.original_text: "But never mind that!" {n}Bitterness creeps into Argenta's voice.{/n} "I thought myself special, chosen, worthier than all my sisters even back when I was a novice. Pride. I was blinded by pride. In reality, every step of my way here was fraught with errors."

traits.locale_text: "Aber vergesst das!" {n}Verbitterung schleicht sich in Argentas Stimme.{/n} "Ich hielt mich für etwas Besonderes, auserkoren, würdiger als alle meine Schwestern, schon als ich noch Novizin war. Hochmut. Ich war von Hochmut geblendet. In Wahrheit war jeder Schritt meines Wegs hierher mit Fehlern gepflastert."

languages.text: "Ancak boş ver bunları!" {n}Argenta'nın sesinde bir hoşnutsuzluk tınısı var.{/n} "Henüz aceminin tekiyken bile özel veya seçilmiş olduğumu, kardeşlerimden daha layık olduğumu düşünüyordum. Kibir. Kibrim beni körleştirdi. Hakikat ise şu: Buraya gelene kadar attığım her adım, hataların gölgesinde kaldı."
languages.original_text: "But never mind that!" {n}Bitterness creeps into Argenta's voice.{/n} "I thought myself special, chosen, worthier than all my sisters even back when I was a novice. Pride. I was blinded by pride. In reality, every step of my way here was fraught with errors."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak boş ver bunları!" {n}Argenta'nın sesinde bir hoşnutsuzluk tınısı var.{/n} "Henüz aceminin tekiyken bile özel veya seçilmiş olduğumu, kardeşlerimden daha layık olduğumu düşünüyordum. Kibir. Kibrim beni körleştirdi. Hakikat ise şu: Buraya gelene kadar attığım her adım, hataların gölgesinde kaldı."
